data.persona: I am an enemy of the town. I have often done things that they do not like. I am tall and have a beard and very burly. I am often seen as mean and often can be seen with a cigar in my mouth.
data.description:
You are in the Outpost.
A simple outpost with 3 wooden buildings near the middle of the mountain. A bonfire in the middle with several wooden logs surrounding it. A barracks, Armory, and Dining Hall stands around the bonfire. A wooden wall surrounds the outpost.
There's a horseshoe, a wooden wall, a barrack, a bonfire, a horse, a log, a Dining Hall, and a Armory here.
The soldier and the blacksmith are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to set the barracks on fire.
data.mid_motivation: I want the entire outpost to burn down.
data.long_motivation: I want to overthrow the entire kingdom.
